titleStmt.title: A cure for the cankering error of the new Eutychians who (concerning the truth) have erred, saying, that our blessed mediator did not take his flesh of the Virgin Mary, neither was he made of the seed of David according to the flesh, and thereby have overthrown the faith of some / by Thomas Monck.
titleStmt.author: Monck, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
